title: The Half Series: When Black People Look White
description: The Half Series – When Black People Look White started as a three-part blog series written in 2010 at the Dangerous Lee Network. I shared my experiences raising a “mixed” child as well as my opinions on the concept of Black people and White people. It has remained a top ranked blog post for almost five years!The Half Series now includes interviews with a group of mixed/biracial men and women who openly share their experiences (good and bad) growing up and where they stand on the subject of colorism and being mixed today.This 35 page eBook features interviews, photos and fun facts!
author: Dangerous Lee
